channel.title: Summer School
channel.description: Tomorrow is my first day of summer school and I've never had it before :(. Is it bad? I live in an area where a lot of wannabe badass mexicans live, and I'm a skinny white dude. Am I gonna die?

item.title: Summer School
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

ChaosPkers:

yeah my first day was today and it felt LONG for 4 hours. but in math it was ratios/long division which is what i’m best at, so i’ll be fine in there. in reading it was just read a story/ answer questions. i was one of 2 who passed. ironic how the 2 people who did pass were 2 of 3 whites in the class huh

Ratios and long division…? Are you in like 6th grade? Or what?

Read full topic

item.title: Summer School
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Yeah, when I went everyday seemed so long, but it was still fun, sucked that I had to get up at 8:30am for it though.

Read full topic

yeah my first day was today and it felt LONG for 4 hours. but in math it was ratios/long division which is what i’m best at, so i’ll be fine in there. in reading it was just read a story/ answer questions. i was one of 2 who passed. ironic how the 2 people who did pass were 2 of 3 whites in the class huh

item.title: Summer School
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Been there done that, summer school was more fun then normal school to me. My teacher just made us watch movies for the hole time, for history.

Read full topic

item.title: Summer School
item.dc:creator: @Fagex1 Fagex.
item.description:
@Fagex1 wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:8, topic:342134”][quote author=zoltanman link=topic=438544.msg3223461#msg3223461 date=1275356933]

My recommendation is to stop slacking off in school so you wouldn’t have to worry about this.

Most people go to summer school to get ahead…
[/quote]Wow. Did I say people did or did not? This kid obviously doesn’t want to go, which implies he slacked off and got a bad grade in a class. I said NOTHING about most people needing to go to summer school because they failed a class…[/quote]
“I’ve never had it before :(. Is it bad? I live in an area where a lot of wannabe badass mexicans live, and I’m a skinny white dude. Am I gonna die?”

This tone is scared/not knowing what is going on. So your wrong. He obviously never implied he doesn’t want to go.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

Summer school is not that long.
It just wastes like 6 wesndays for like 2 hours.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“zoltanman, post:7, topic:342134”][quote author=Lin link=topic=438544.msg3223099#msg3223099 date=1275341926]
My recommendation is to stop slacking off in school so you wouldn’t have to worry about this.
[/quote]

Most people go to summer school to get ahead…[/quote]
Not where I live.
